personalInfo.name: Abhijeet Mishra
personalInfo.title: Full Stack & AI Engineer
about: I'm Abhijeet Mishra, a Melbourne-based full stack developer focused on building resilient platforms for universities, startups, and eCommerce teams that need dependable automation.
My build process covers prototyping, user walkthroughs, and production-ready deployment so every release ships with confidence across the entire stack.
Along the way I've delivered AI-powered solutions like the EdGenAI grading assistant, the MyCareerMate resume builder, and Melbourne Institute of Technology's LMS for 16,000+ students.
personalInfo.tagline: Full stack development across prototyping, deployment, and practical AI solutions.

education.description: Focusing on enterprise-scale cloud architecture, AI for business, and human-centred design while collaborating with founders across Melbourne.

workExperience.description: Own the automated grading platform's website development, user acceptance testing and launch cycles, and the production-ready release across Next.js, Azure Functions, and Python scoring engines.
Leading the resume builder start-up through website build, prototype validation, user testing, and the scalable production release serving 50K+ job seekers.
Delivered the SoundPro eCommerce website end-to-end, driving website development, user acceptance testing and launch, and a production-ready storefront for the intercom marketplace.
Built the institute's LMS website, introducing modular services for assessments, content scheduling, and student analytics across 16,000+ learners.

projects.title: EdGenAI Automated Grading
projects.description: Website development plus prototype-to-production pipeline for the AI grader, covering user acceptance testing, launch, and production hardening inside Azure.

projects.title: MyCareerMate
projects.description: AI-powered resume builder where I shipped the prototype, ran user testing sprints, and launched the scalable production version on Vercel.

projects.title: SoundPro eCommerce Platform
projects.description: MyIntegrator engagement to build the SoundPro intercom marketplace website with custom checkout UX, user acceptance testing, launch planning, and a production-ready storefront.

extraCurricular.description: Bootstrapped the platform and community events that taught job seekers how to craft measurable stories.
Host weekend sprints for student founders exploring AI-first ideas across Melbourne.
Share practical frameworks for mixing human grading with LLM copilots across universities.
